name: Legionlands: auto battler game
description:
Legionlands is a free, classic autobattler which combines turn-based strategy features and card battles. Choose the characters to fight for you on the magic arena: Minotaurs or archers, crossbowmen or bogatyrs. Create an invincible army in the epic universe of LegionLands!

STRATEGY! IS IT YOUR THING?

Spectacular game battles await your Legion. It's a thrilling experience to watch and take part in. Highly-detailed units will make autobattles more dynamic. It's time to cast the spells and earn the golden coins in our magic world of LegionLands!

START THE BATTLE GAMES ONLINE

You are the king on this battlefield, where over 30 unique units are waiting for your tactical skills. Spread your warriors all around the battle arena or get your army together to attack and threaten your enemies. It's up to you whether your army wins or leaves the battlefield empty-handed.

THE ARENA IS WAITING FOR YOU, MY LORD KING!

The war of Clans opens once a week. You can join an existing clan or create your own one to take part in Clan Battles. You have to pass 100 waves to open the tactical puzzles, where some new units and schemes of enemy formations will be given to you. Your task is to place the units on the Arena in such a way that your Legion wins. But can you use your skills in the right way when you have all the cards in front of you?

PVP ARENA BATTLES

Each unit has a set of unique skills. Combine your units to make your army stronger and more powerful. In LegionLands you can:

- Upgrade units and squad levels;
- Get magic artifacts to increase your combat power;
- Fight against the most dangerous and violent enemies of this epic universe;
- Play both: online and full-featured offline gameplay without the Internet;
- Get over 30 strong kingdom heroes;
- Fight in daily boss battles;
- Take part in PvP battles (PvP).

While taking a break from the battles, complete quests and earn coins and mine for gold, or even go hiking for new resources. This is your royal battle! You will never get bored!

YOU'RE IN FOR A BIG FIGHT!

Do you think this is a simple auto battler? No way! Make sure it's not an easy thing by entering the magical world of LegionLands! Start the battle after having your army position checked. Only the strongest players will stay alive. Let the battle of wits begin!
